description: The Pip-Boy 3000 was widely regarded as a pinnacle of durable personal electronic equipment, boasting a highly detailed biometric monitor, personal ledger, global positioning system, radio and general information processor. Although Pip-Boys are often durable enough to resist the ravages of nuclear devastation, they are still quite rare, and as such must be shepherded on account of the unique set of functions they can perform. Produced by the famed RobCo industries.

description: A central processor unit for a vault water purification system, necessary for a vault to produce potable water.
